snippet: Jurors in the murder trial of George Zimmerman will be sequestered, Judge Debra S. Nelson ruled Thursday.
abstract: Judge Debra S Nelson rules that jurors in Florida murder trial of George Zimmerman will be sequestered; he is charged with shooting death of Trayvon Martin.
lead_paragraph: Jurors in the murder trial of George Zimmerman will be sequestered, Judge Debra S. Nelson ruled Thursday.

headline.main: Florida: Zimmerman Jury Will Be Sequestered
headline.print_headline: Florida: Zimmerman Jury Will Be Sequestered
